title: "Class 6: Risk Premium and WTP"

## Objectives

- Calculate risk premium and willingness-to-pay for health insurance
- Explain and draw graphically how the risk premium varies with the curvature of the utility function, probability of illness, and amount of potential loss
- Discuss viability of high-risk pools
 
## Activities

- Discussion of Humana and importance of risk pools
- In-class problem on the demand for health insurance. The worksheet is [here](/resources/wksheet2.html).
